messages.message: I'm trying to rebuild nginx right now and running into the same problem Matt originally was. I've refreshed the base image, followed the passphrase instructions, and added the line to /etc/hosts; I run `cs down nginx`, `make build-docker`, `cs up nginx`, then I see the `Error resolving address: Name or service not known` . @sean.donohoe anything else you can think of here that I should be doing?
